name: Hot Shots Golf
description:
'Crayon Golf' is a set of simple, yet challenging puzzles designed to exercise the mind and relax the soul. Direct the coloured eggs into the coloured nests while avoiding obstacles and utilizing tools such as warps, fans and conveyer belts. There are 100 levels to complete and 15 hidden stars!
Try the Apple TV version as well!

- Supports iPad, iPhone
- Supports GameCenter
